title: Define System Architecture for Autonomous Vehicles
description: Create a high-level design and architecture for the autonomous vehicles, considering urban environments.

title: Design Urban Navigation System
description: Develop a navigation system that ensures safe and efficient movement of autonomous vehicles in urban environments.
dependencies: Define System Architecture for Autonomous Vehicles

title: Develop Sensor and Perception System
description: Design and implement sensors to enable the autonomous vehicles to perceive their environment accurately.
dependencies: Define System Architecture for Autonomous Vehicles

title: Implement Machine Learning Models for Decision Making
description: Develop machine learning models to enable the autonomous vehicles to make safe and intelligent decisions.

title: Create User Interface for Vehicle Controls
description: Design an intuitive user interface for controlling the autonomous vehicles when necessary, or monitoring their status.
dependencies: Define System Architecture for Autonomous Vehicles
